meanings.definition: A person who visits a place often.
meanings.sent1: The park frequenter enjoyed feeding the ducks every day.
meanings.sent2: The coffee shop frequenter always orders the same drink.
meanings.sent3: The library frequenter accidentally fell asleep while reading a book.
meanings.sent4: The gym frequenter's dedication is like a shining beacon to others.
meanings.sent5: The movie theater frequenter knows all the best seats in the house.

meanings.sent1: She frequenter the bakery to buy fresh bread for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: They frequenter the beach every weekend to relax.
meanings.sent3: He frequenter the ice cream shop even in the winter.
meanings.sent4: The cat frequenter the garden to chase butterflies.
meanings.sent5: We frequenter the park for our daily walks.
